TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManifestSignatureInformationCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation>

Docs.summary: Represents a read-only collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks To get a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformationCollection> collection, call one of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation.VerifySignature%2A> method overloads.
Each collection contains a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation> object for each manifest that was verified by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation.VerifySignature%2A> method.
